Description détaillée
Previously used to integrate moontoast/math as a bignum arithmetic library, BigNumberTimeConverter is deprecated in favor of GenericTimeConverter
Obsolète
Transition to { Voir également
GenericTimeConverter}.
@psalm-immutable

Documentation des fonctions membres
calculateTime() calculateTimeBigNumberTimeConverter BigNumberTimeConvertercalculateTime
calculateTime (string $seconds, string $microseconds)
Uses the provided seconds and micro-seconds to calculate the count of 100-nanosecond intervals since UTC 00:00:00.00, 15 October 1582, for RFC 4122 variant UUIDs
RFC 4122, § 4.2.2: Generation Details string $seconds A string representation of the number of seconds since the Unix epoch for the time to calculate string $microseconds A string representation of the micro-seconds associated with the time to calculate Hexadecimal The full UUID timestamp as a Hexadecimal value -pure
Implémente TimeConverterInterface.
convertTime() convertTimeBigNumberTimeConverter BigNumberTimeConverterconvertTime
convertTime (Hexadecimal $uuidTimestamp)
Converts a timestamp extracted from a UUID to a Unix timestamp
Paramètres
Hexadecimal$uuidTimestamp
A hexadecimal representation of a UUID timestamp; a UUID timestamp is a count of 100-nanosecond intervals since UTC 00:00:00.00, 15 October 1582.
